Title: ServiceControl

HomeWiki:
With ServiceControl MP you can check your servers services. Some times windows services stopped unexpectedly. With this MP, if any service stopped –with Automatic Startup Type- a warning alert will generated.

You can pass parameter to the monitor to exclude some services. If you don’t want to monitor a service with automatic startup type, you can exclude. You can exclude a service to a specific server or a group of servers or all of windows computers.
